description:
OptsParse should be used for all options parsing.

NOTE: This bug breaks the (currently 3rd-party) ZeroMQ RPC driver as it expects that all queue topics are stored in OptsParse. No other Nova  topics are declares via gflags.
title: xvp_proxy should use OptsParse for consoleauth_topic

comments.content:
OptsParse should be used for all options parsing.

NOTE: This bug breaks the (currently 3rd-party) ZeroMQ RPC driver as it expects that all queue topics are stored in OptsParse. No other Nova  topics are declares via gflags.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ewindisch

comments.content: xvp_proxy is using opt parse. flags.DECLARE is not defining a flag.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~vishvananda
